entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer for dependent static fields of value types. #72164
  • Remove unnecessary imports analyzer is significantly slowing builds (11% CPU time) #72162
  • Too much string allocations in `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72161
  • dotnet format incorrectly removing using directives of Blazor/Razor components since 8.0.201 #72160

Closed

  • Verbatim identifier prefix is displayed inconsistently in tooltips for anonymous types #71638
    Backlog
  • [Feature request]: Code folding for invocation expressions that span multiple lines #67929

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce string allocations from `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72163
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in TextDocumentStates.SelectAs* methods #72159
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix quick info for anonymous types not escaping identifiers named as keywords #72047
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Slight reduction in allocations under CSharpRecommendationServiceRunner.IsUndesirable #72158
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused OmniSharp extension method #72154
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support more than one frozen source generated document at once #72115
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during check for duplicate analyzers #72144
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Add invariant around nullable conditional state #72072
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, 17.10
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
